## Loading data

We will load the dataset "gapminderÂ· included in the R package '{gapminder}'

```{r}
library(gapminder)
gapminder

```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Preprocess data

We will filter just data from 2007

```{r}
#| echo: true
library(dplyr)
gapminder_2007 <- gapminder |> 
  filter(year == 2007)

```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Plot the data

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| echo: true
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(gapminder_2007) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = lifeExp, y = gdpPercap, colour =  continent)) + 
  ggthemes::scale_color_colorblind() +
  theme_minimal()
```
